article.title: September 2021 Galactic News
article.content:
• Featured news
  • Community News
  • Event News
  • Galaxy Platforms News
  • Doc, Hub, and Training Updates
  • Publications
  • Other News

Hello all,

The August newsletter brings news of GCC2021 (just finished) and GCC2022 (in Minneapolis); the launch of the Galaxy India community, and open positions in 7 countries; event news; Galaxy platform news; training and doc updates; recent open-access Galaxy-related publications; and other news too.

Dave Clements and Beatriz Serrano-Solano, Editors

PS: Subscribe to the Galaxy Announce mailing list and receive an email whenever this newsletter is published.

Featured news

Community News

Galaxy Career Center

Ten new positions were added to the Galaxy Career Center in the last month. Many of them close soon:

  • Australia, closes 11 August
  • Norway, closes 15 August
  • France x 3, 1 closes 22 August, 2 close 1 September
  • the Netherlands, 22 August
  • Germany, closes 31 August

There are also "open until filled" positions in the US (x7) and Belgium. Take a look.

New Galaxy Videos

In addition to the GCC2021 talks (54 of them, see above) and the GCC2021 Training Week Videos (almost 200 of them, see above) several other videos have also been published recently. Here's a sample.

  • Galaxy 101, our basic tutorial gets an update
  • Collections 101, a new Galactic Introduction video
  • Restricting the Galaxy Tool Panel, a recording of the July 22 Developer Round Table call.
  • ASaiM: From a local project to a global effort to support microbiome data analysis, Bérénice Batut at the "Holistic Bioinformatic Approaches used in Microbiome Research" conference

Event News

There is not a lot going on in August, but what is happening is compelling. See all upcoming events here:

Galaxy @ BioHackathon 2021

Galaxy is featured in at least 7 projects at BioHackathon Europe 2021, being held in Barcelona and online, 8-12 November. Registration is available on a first come, first serve basis. Registration is free, but space is limited. Register now.

Galaxy Developer Roundtable

August's Galaxy Developer Round Table meetup is:

August 19: TBD

As you can see, we still need volunteers (like you!) to lead the discussion on your favorite topic.

Galaxy Platforms News

The Galaxy Platform Directory lists resources for easily running your analysis on Galaxy, including publicly available servers, cloud services, and containers and VMs that run Galaxy. Here's the recent platform news we know about:

UseGalaxy.* News

  • Lots of tool updates on UseGalaxy.eu and UseGalaxy.org.au.

Doc, Hub, and Training Updates

Publications

Pub curation activities are on a semi-hiatus right now but a few publications referencing, using, extending, and implementing Galaxy were added to the Galaxy Publication Library anyway. Here are the new open access Galactic and Stellar pubs:

Other News
